name: Hero Ranger and the Wrath of the Mad Farmer APOCALYPSE
name_original: Hero Ranger and the Wrath of the Mad Farmer APOCALYPSE
description:
Greetings, fellow hero!

You probably want to take a look at my game? Of course you do! Why? Because I'm here it offers a full experience of fantasy world adventures! As soon as you launch that game you won't have time to sleep, eat or even socialize!

please help me im so lonely :(

Over a... LOT of gameplay time! Explore the fantastic world of Hero Ranger to defeat Forces of Darkness that are willing to overcome the earth!

With this game you get:

  • Precise, hand drawn graphics done by professionals to deliever full immersion!
  • Complex and intriguing story which won't let you unimpressed!
  • Unique combat system offering absolute freedom in fighting style!
  • Soft and enjoyable music to add the atmosphere!
And all that for just 0.00$! Get one now!

Seriously though. I kinda made this game in four days or so with.. eh... no knowlege of how to oranize code and resources (sorry for the file size, I really don't know how to optimize it). I tried to mimic rpg-like games with twitchy dialogues and weird quests.

I also tried to make graphics as much off and funny (so as bad) as I can. To be honest I don't know what else to put in here. Thanks for visiting my game!
